title: Why is the Media Ducking the Biden Trainwreck? (Ep 1197)
description:
In this episode, I discuss President Trump’s eye-opening comments last night about Joe Biden and I address the explosive scandal he was referring to. I also address the inside story of the Coronavirus response that the media is largely ignoring. 

News Picks:


Did Joe Biden break the law with his offer to Pete Buttigieg?

Are there now two strains of the Coronavirus spreading?

Congress approved 8.3 billion to battle Coronavirus. 


Hunter Biden gets busted, again, for trying to use connections to get a job.

The Democrats have a big Biden problem in Ukraine that is NOT going away. 


John Solomon uncovered the Biden corruption in this astonishing December 2019 article.


Big developments in the Carter Page case.

Bloomberg & Steyer are evidence that money isn’t the only factor in elections.

Liberals are freaking out because they’re getting “fact-checked” on social media.

Democrats are asking for Secret Service protection for Joe Biden.


Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
